item.title: my first flight in an Airbus A-380
item.description: 07:37 Saturday 16 December 2017 -02 Last night was my (and Lin’s) first time to travel in an Airbus A380. Our flight was around 15 hours from Dubai to SÃ£o Paulo on Emirates, which is apparently Airbus’ largest A380 customer. I was impressed with how relatively quiet the plane was during the entire flight. (I had a window seat just at the trailing edge of the wings.) We had a hard landing with a bounce, but the aircraft came to a stop very quickly and smoothly.
